1.0.name: wordpress/en-son-izledigim-film
1.0.description:
Info:

Plugin URI: http://emreesirik.com/?p=364 Detail: Latest which movie did you watched, search movie, IMDB details for movie is added automaticly, and add your movie to your last watched movies list. If you want to show your watched movie list in page, there is an shortcut. Version: 1.0 Yazar: Emre Esirik

WordPress IMDB Plugin – Last Watched Movie WordPress plugin provide you in your site, list your watched movies, lastest watched movie show bar on widget. I developed this plugin and I use this plugin in my site.

Version 1.0

  • MultiLanguage, Language Selection. (now Support English, Turkish).

  • Create Sidebar Widget , set number to show how many movie on side menus.

  • Create new page that shows your movie list with using shortcut.

  • Admin Page can manage this plugin perfectly. With using admin page, all movie operation like add, edit, s
